a.detail: A toppled statue lies across the corridor
a.summary: A toppled statue lies across the corridor

details.history: The dungeon was created by hobgoblins as a maze. It was eventually abandoned due to plague, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.

hidden_treasure: Trapped and Locked Good Wooden Chest (DC 20 to unlock, DC 20 to break; 15 hp)

Poisoned Arrow Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +7 to hit against one target, 18d10 piercing/poison damage

40000 gp, 29000 pp, a fine leather saddle sewn with platinum (7500 gp), a gold bracer inlaid with a meandros of orichalcum (7500 gp), a perfect rose frozen in time (7500 gp), a platinum dagger set with a single flawless black sapphire (7500 gp), Spell Scroll (Creation) (rare, dmg 200), Bag of Beans (11 beans) (rare, dmg 152)

settings.name: The Dread Hive of Kas the Betrayer

wandering_monsters.1: Stone Giant Dreamwalker (cr 10, motm 234, vgm 150); deadly, 5900 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.2: 4 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 4 x Owlbear (cr 3, mm 249); hard, 3200 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.3: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 15 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); hard, 1200 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.4: 15 x Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); hard, 1700 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.5: Orc Claw of Luthic (cr 2, vgm 183) and 13 x Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246); hard, 1750 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.6: Venom Troll (cr 7, motm 248, mtf 245) and 1 x Troll (cr 5, mm 291); deadly, 4700 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
